description: This is a React functional component defining an admin management interface with tabs for managing users, roles, and tenants. It contains subcomponents for each panel, handles creation, updating, deletion, and displays lists fetched via API calls. The file is a significant part of the administrative frontend for the application.

methods.name: UsersPanel
methods.description: Component managing the user list, creation, editing, and deletion. Uses React hooks and Material-UI components for UI.

methods.name: RolesPanel
methods.description: Component managing roles list, addition, and deletion.

methods.name: TenantsPanel
methods.description: Component managing tenants list, creation, and deletion.
